---
title: "extract_pathways"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(StarBioTrek)
```

```{r}
species="hsapiens"
pathwaydb="nci"
pathways <- GetData(species, pathwaydb)

#get genes in all pathways + save in file
pathway_ALLGENE <- GetPathData(path_ALL=pathways)
capture.output(pathway_ALLGENE, file="NCI_Pathways_StarBioTrek_May7_2019.txt")
```
